TheWitchHouse.text: In an old journal you learn some horrible eldritch secrets. Roll a die. Lose that much Sanity and gain that many Clue tokens.

InnerSanctum.text: You attend a ceremony in which the order opens a gate and a monster bursts out of it before the gate closes once more. A monster appears!

SilverTwilightLodge.text: "Care to join the Order?" Carl Sanford and several of his henchmen ask. If you accept, pay $3 and take a Silver Twilight Membership. If you decline, pass a Will (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina as the henchmen assist you out the door. Wheather you pass or not, move to the street.
